name: PixoCities
description:
A RELAXING, HIDDEN OBJECT-CITY BUILDER.

Build and explore intricate cities, interact with people and uncover their daily lives.




Play inside a mix of pre-built environments and cities you build yourself. Help direct people to their goals, while keeping your city layout free of obstructions. Feel like an artist as you unlock more and more content to make your own spectacular city!





Explore art from eBoy's 20 year career, brought to life in a vibrant, fully interactive videogame world.

FEATURES

  • Over 300 custom interactions
  • More than 500 buildings
  • 3 distinct city areas to discover
  • Unlock free build mode, to bring out your inner artist
  • More than 30 pre-built vignettes to discover
  • 10,000+ unique frames of pixel art!
